description: Pacifica SPF 30 Mineral Clear Lip BalmSuncare + Lipcare100% vegan and cruelty-freeWhat it is: A hydrating lip balm with the added benefits of SPF protection. Integrating lip care into sun care with beneficial including coconut oil and shea butter. Created by and for surfers (and all their friends who love to play and be in the sun and salt water). Scented with natural coconut for a true beach vibe- no matter where your adventures may happen. What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! Shake this can well as it contains suspended minerals that you need for best results. Apply liberally to all exposed skin. SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. And while our sunscreens apply evenly and can have a more translucent look, they work as a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. What else you should know: Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.Formulated without petroleum, parabens, silicones, retinyl palmitate, phthalates & chemical UV absorbers.Directions. Sun damage is serious and sunscreens are only effective if you use them properly!

description:
Don't shun the sun! Embrace the day with biodegradable sunscreens that provide broad spectrum protection without oxybenzone or vitamin A. Extracts in these gluten free, botanically-based sunscreen lotions keep skin nourished and healthy-looking. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.
-Convenient single-touch, spray-at-any-angle application with an eco-friendly, aerosol-free, air-powered system that uses no chemical
or flammable propellants
-Water resistant (80 minutes) with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 protection against sunburn, skin cancer
and premature signs of aging
-Biodegradable, hypo-allergenic, gluten free and recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation
-100% vegetarian ingredients
-NO: oxybenzone, parabens or animal testing

description:
Escape to a tropical paradise every time you smooth on our protective Hawaiian sunscreens. With our biodegradable, gluten-free, broad spectrum sunscreen lotions and nourishing Hawaiian botanicals, you won’t have a care in the world. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.
-Very water resistant (up to 80 minutes), biodegradable, gluten-free, broad spectrum protection with green tea antioxidants & soothing aloe vera
-Recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation
-100% vegetarian ingredients
-No animal testing
-NO: oxybenzone, parabens or vitamin A

description: Pacifica SPF 30 Mineral Color Lip BalmSun care + Lip care100% vegan and cruelty-freeWhat it is: A hydrating lip balm with the added benefits of SPF protection. 2 easy to wear mineral shades: nude and peach. Integrating lip care into sun care with beneficials including coconut oil and shea butter. Created by and for surfers (and all their friends who love to play and be in the sun and salt water). Everyone deserves the best ingredients, the best performance and the best scents. What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! Shake this can well as it contains suspended minerals that you need for best results. Apply liberally to all exposed skin. SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. An opaque tint should be expected with this product, as it is a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. What else you should know: Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.Formulated without petroleum, parabens, silicones, retinyl palmitate, phthalates & chemical UV absorbers.Directions. Sun damage is serious and sunscreens are only effective if you use them properly!
title: Pacifica SPF 30 Mineral Color Lip Balm - Peach .15oz

description:
CōTZ Sensitive is ideal for special skin types & conditions. Keeps harmful UV rays from touching or penetrating the skin, while soothing sensitive and easily-irritated skin. Soft & sheer with just what you need to protect your sensitive skin and no more, including the #1 rated sun protection ingredient against burning and aging UVA-UVB rays.

Dermatologist Recommended & Gentle enough for special skin types & conditions:
- Laser, Cosmetic Surgery, Microdermabrasion, Acid, Peel
- Acne, Rosacea
- Psoriasis, Eczema, Lupus/Rheumatology
- Sun-Sensitive due to medical procedure & medications

A Gentle Mineral Complex that helps prevent heat build-up in the skin, which can damage the dermis. CōTZ helps prevent pre-mature skin aging (fine lines, wrinkles, sagging, age spots), uneven skin tone and other serious problems.

CōTZ sits invisibly on top of the skin and functions like thousands of mirrors to deflect UVA-UVB rays before the rays can touch or penetrate the skin.

CōTZ is 100% Free of chemical sunscreen ingredients, here’s why: Chemical sunscreens absorb UVA-UVB rays into the skin and transform the rays into heat, which can damage the dermis.

CōTZ Sensitive for Healthier skin:
- 100% Free of Oils, Chemical Sunscreens, Oils, Fragrances, Preservatives, PABA, Gluten, Phthalates
- Will not irritate or sting
- Contains #1 and #2 rated sun protection ingredients for UVA-UVB rays
- SPF 40 exceeds the level recommended by Skin Cancer experts
- Provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection
- Photostable, will not breakdown when exposed to sunlight
- Water Resistant (40 Minutes)
- Non-Greasy
- Not tested on animals
title: CoTZ® Sensitive Sunscreen Lotion - SPF 40 - 3.5oz

Go Natural & Stay Nourished with Sunology

Sunology natural sunscreen products are made with a powerful, concentrated, mineral-based, broad-spectrum SPF 50 formula. Using only natural active ingredients, Sunology is a physical sunscreen that reflects the sun’s harmful rays rather than absorbing them and nourishes the skin with essential oils that provide vitamins and antioxidants designed to promote healthy, more youthful skin when worn regularly.
